item.title: Guestbook
item.description: If you can guess the secret email, I’ll publish your message here! If you wish to keep your name private, please sign with an alias, otherwise I will use your first name. Message from “Emily” 10/27/2023: hello im gay Message from “armitag3” 10/27/2023: guestbook this game is going to the ONE place not yet tainted by capitalism ~ armitag3 Message from “RadicalGnu” 10/27/2023: Did I get it? First! â€” RadicalGnu

item.title: Under Construction
item.description: Welcome to the Cosmosporia website! This is incredibly under construction and more information will be added as time permits. “Pardon Our Dust”
